RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Formado em Fsica pela Universidade de Calcut (2003), mestrado em Fsica na Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (2005), doutorado em Fisica Fondamentale e Applicata na Universita degli Studi di Napoli Federico II (2011) na Itlia, ps-doutorados em Fsica Matemtica na CQUeST, Sogang University (2011-2012), Seoul National University (2012-2013) nos Coria do Sul e na Universidade de Sao Paulo (2014-2017)e Universidade Federal de Parana (UFPR) (2017-2019) Raju tem experincia na rea de Fsica terica, com nfase em teoria de cordas, gravidade e teoria geral de partculas e campos.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: With a Bachelors degree from University of Calcutta (2003) and subsequently a Masters degree in Physics from Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (2005), Raju went on to receive his doctorate in Theoretical Physics from University of Napoli Federico II (2011). Then he did 3 years of postdoc at CQUeST and Seoul National University in Korea before joining USP as a postdoc with a FAPESP fellowship. He has experience in the areas of Theoretical Physics with a focus on Quantum Field Theory, Gauge theory, Gravity and Strings.

ENDERECO-PROFISSIONAL.LOGRADOURO-COMPLEMENTO: Rua Francisco H dos Santos, 100 Curitiba 82590-300

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
My primary Research interests include
(1) Mathematical Physics namely Emergent Gravity, Integrable Models, Dynamical Systems, Non-Commutative geometry and Topological gauge theory
(2) Full background independence in string theory
(3) Holographic ideas in Condensed matter physics, AdS/CMT
(4) Black Holes in Supergravity, Attractor Mechanism, Special Kahler Geometry, Flux Vacua Attractors and Compactiﬁcations
(5) Gauged Supergravity from M-theory on Toric Sasaki Einstein manifold and Quiver Gauge theory
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES:
My primary Research interests include
(1) Mathematical Physics namely Emergent Gravity, Integrable Models, Dynamical Systems, Non-Commutative geometry and Topological gauge theory, L_infinity algebra
(2) Full background independence in string theory
(3) Holographic ideas in Condensed matter physics, AdS/CMT
(4) Black Holes in Supergravity, Attractor Mechanism, Special Kahler Geometry, Flux Vacua Attractors and Compactiﬁcations
(5) Gauged Supergravity from M-theory on Toric Sasaki Einstein manifold and Quiver Gauge theory

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Teoria de Campos, Teoria de Cordas, Fsica Matemtica, Gravitao

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Interplay between gravity and dynamical integrable systems.

My research plan encompasses Non-commutative geometry and emergent gravity and is aimed at the ultimate unification between matter and geometry. The trinity of instantons namely between NC U(1) instantons, gravitational instantons and SU(2) Yang-Mills instantons may pave the path for such a novel unification scheme. A better understanding of the integrable systems in 4 dimension may be useful in the sense that, self dual 2 forms can be defined only in 4 dimensions and all physical forces namely electromagnetic force, strong and weak force and gravitational force are represented by 2 forms on some orientable manifolds. According to Ward conjecture, self-dual systems in d=4 is the parent theory of (all) integrable systems in lower dimensions for eg. Hitchin systems in 2d, KdV etc. According to a theorem by Hitchin any hyperkahler manifold (kaher and Ricci flat) has one-to-one correspondence with a twistor space, so twistor space descriptions of instantons are also worth pursuing topics. Matrix model descriptions of gravitational instantons (which are hyper kahler manifolds) will lead to background independent theory of quantum gravity and emergent concept of spacetime will be a key concept in this framework. A better understanding of integrable systems or twistor space construction in terms of ADHM prescription is also an important subject for further study.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: My research plan encompasses Non-commutative geometry and emergent gravity and is aimed at the ultimate unification between matter and geometry. The trinity of instantons namely between NC U(1) instantons, gravitational instantons and SU(2) Yang-Mills instantons may pave the path for such a novel unification scheme. A better understanding of the integrable systems in 4 dimension may be useful in the sense that, self dual 2 forms can be defined only in 4 dimensions and all physical forces namely electromagnetic force, strong and weak force and gravitational force are represented by 2 forms on some orientable manifolds. According to Ward conjecture, self-dual systems in d=4 is the parent theory of (all) integrable systems in lower dimensions for eg. Hitchin systems in 2d, KdV etc. According to a theorem by Hitchin any hyperkahler manifold (kaher and Ricci flat) has one-to-one correspondence with a twistor space, so twistor space descriptions of instantons are also worth pursuing topics. Matrix model descriptions of gravitational instantons (which are hyper kahler manifolds) will lead to background independent theory of quantum gravity and emergent concept of spacetime will be a key concept in this framework. A better understanding of integrable systems or twistor space construction in terms of ADHM prescription is also an important subject for further study.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: An Investigation into gravity/CYBE correspondence beyond integrability
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What is the general class of gravitational solutions included in the gravity/CYBE correspondence? It has already been shown that the correspondence includes deformations which cannot be obtained by TsT transformations. The result obtained so far indicates that the integrability of the parent theory is not an essential feature. Thus, we see that the class of gravitational solutions captured by the correspondence is much wider than the examples that were discovered before. What is the full moduli space of gravity solutions captured by the gravity/CYBE correspondence remains an open problem. There are various examples of coset supergravity backgrounds, integrable and non-integrable, such that its Yang-Baxter deformations remain as supergravity solutions. The non-trivial question is whether this is the case for a generic coset supergravity background and a generic r-matrix. Although a counter-example has not been found so far, there is no proof that this is true in general. Answering this question could lead to new insights into the structure of the moduli space of possible gravity solutions, and the action of classical r-matrices on this space. This issue deserves to be studied as a fundamental problem.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What is the general class of gravitational solutions included in the gravity/CYBE correspondence? It has already been shown that the correspondence includes deformations which cannot be obtained by TsT transformations. The result obtained so far indicates that the integrability of the parent theory is not an essential feature. Thus, we see that the class of gravitational solutions captured by the correspondence is much wider than the examples that were discovered before. What is the full moduli space of gravity solutions captured by the gravity/CYBE correspondence remains an open problem. There are various examples of coset supergravity backgrounds, integrable and non-integrable, such that its Yang-Baxter deformations remain as supergravity solutions. The non-trivial question is whether this is the case for a generic coset supergravity background and a generic r-matrix. Although a counter-example has not been found so far, there is no proof that this is true in general. Answering this question could lead to new insights into the structure of the moduli space of possible gravity solutions, and the action of classical r-matrices on this space. This issue deserves to be studied as a fundamental problem.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: An Investigation into gravity/CYBE correspondence beyond integrability

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: High Energy Lorentz Violation and the Restoration of the Symmetry at IR
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Lorentz symmetry is a basic ingredient of the Standard Model of particle physics. However, several authors have argued that at high energies {\it Lorentz symmetry} and possibly CPT could be broken. The Lorentz violating parameters of the Standard Model (Colladay-Kostelecky) extended in the power-counting renormalisable sector have been measured with great precision. It turns out that Lorentz symmetry is a very precise symmetry of nature, at least in the low-energy domain. Recent analysis of gamma-ray bursts suggests a bound on the scale of $\tilde{M}$ of Lorentz violation that is found to be $\tilde{M} \ge 1.3 \times 10^{18} GeV$. Since in local QFT odd powers of energy mean that CPT is violated, we can also take this bound to be a bound on the scale of $\Lambda_{CPT}$ of CPT violation. Lorentz violation does not necessarily imply CPT violation, so we may assume the existence of two different scales, one for the Lorentz violation $\Lambda_L$ while the other being $\Lambda_{CPT}$ for CPT violation with $\Lambda_{CPT} \ge \Lambda_L$. This is why we may assume that there exists an energy range $\Lambda_L \le E \le \Lambda_{CPT}$ that is well described by a Lorentz violating but CPT invariant QFT. The main goal of this project is to answer why it is interesting at all to consider quantum field theories where Lorentz symmetry is explicitly broken. The set of power-counting renormalizable theories are considerably small. One can think of relaxing some of the assumption but this often leaves much room for further enlargement. For example, if we give up locality, then every theory can be made finite and without unitarity even gravity can be made renornmalized. Relaxing Lorentz invariance appears to be interesting in its own right as it could pave the path for a reliable definition for ultraviolet limit of quantum gravity to study extensions of the standard model. effective field theories, nuclear physics and theory of critical phenomena.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Lorentz symmetry is a basic ingredient of the Standard Model of particle physics. This is why we may assume that there exists an energy range $\Lambda_L \le E \le \Lambda_{CPT}$ that is well described by a Lorentz violating but CPT invariant QFT. Relaxing Lorentz invariance appears to be interesting in its own right as it could pave the path for a reliable definition for ultraviolet limit of quantum gravity to study extensions of the standard model. effective field theories, nuclear physics and theory of critical phenomena.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: High Energy Lorentz Violation and the Restoration of the Symmetry at IR
